resources.string: Going back to overview page in a few seconds
This feature will be available soon

Are you sure to delete product \"%1$s\"?\n\nThis also removes any stock amount, the journal and all other references of this product - consider disabling it instead, if you want to keep that and just hide the product.
Products with tare weight enabled are currently not supported for transfer.
This product should\'t be frozen. Do you want to proceed?
Data was copied from the product \"%1$s\".
Removed all ingredients of recipe \"%1$s\" from stock
There are purchases on the device that have not yet been transferred to the server. Tap here for details.

Purchases that have not yet been transferred to the server are displayed here. They were saved together with temporary products in this app so that you could scan your purchase faster in quick mode and not have to create new products for the master data directly.
Tap on the product and fill in the required data. After that, the product will be shown here as online and the stored purchases can be sent to the server.
Tap here to send the stored purchases for this product to the server.
The barcode you\'ve scanned is not linked to a product yet. You can link it to an existing one or create a new product for it.
Product name for barcode is from Open Food Facts.
Product name for barcode is from Open Beauty Facts.
Barcode could not be looked up on Open Food Facts or Open Beauty Facts.
Barcode is not in Open Food Facts or Open Beauty Facts database.
For automatic suggestion of a product name you can activate Open Food Facts look up in the settings.

Transaction which will be executed:

Add %1$s %2$s of %3$s to stock
Due date: %4$s
Price: %5$s
Store: %6$s
Location: %7$s

Transaction which will be executed:

Remove %1$s %2$s of %3$s from stock
Location: %4$s

Transaction which will be executed:

Mark %1$s %2$s of %3$s as opened
Location: %4$s

Transaction which will be executed:

Transfer %1$s %2$s of %3$s
From Location: %4$s
To Location: %5$s

Transaction which will be executed:

Set stock amount of %1$s to %2$s %3$s
Apply for added items:
Due date: %4$s
Price: %5$s
Store: %6$s
Location: %7$s

The plural rules of the current language are not implemented, so maybe a field is missing here where you can enter additional plural forms. You can help translating this app into your language on Transifex (link on our GitHub page) and as soon as your language reaches 80% we will add its plural rules.

This app version is not compatible with the Grocy version on the server.

Current server version: %1$s

Supported server versions:
%2$s
If the current server version has a higher major version number (first digit) than the supported versions and you ignore this warning, data loss (unlikely) or crashes (likely) may occur.
If there is only a minor difference (e.g. third digit is higher) you can probably ignore this warning.
Nothing on your server will be changed. You will be redirected to the login page.

You're using the public demo server https://grocy.info.

None of your changes here are saved forever!
They remain public until the server automatically overwrites them once a day.

On the login screen you can enter your own server address.
Public demo server. Tap for details.
The app must be restarted to apply the current configuration. Do you want to restart it now?
Tap here to show the full description.
You can enable up to 4 shortcuts:
Shortcuts are not supported on this Android version.
You can improve the speed of the barcode detector by configuring it to only detect those formats which you expect to read.
Do you have any wishes, questions or errors? Contact us and let us help!\nOtherwise we would be very happy about a nice review in the Play Store.
Point your camera at a barcode
Press and hold to confirm deletion
Are you sure you want to consume all ingredients needed by the recipe for \"%1$s\"? (ingredients marked with \"only check if any amount is in stock\" will be ignored)
Are you sure you want to put all missing ingredients needed by the recipe for \"%1$s\" on the shopping list?\n\nUncheck ingredients to not put them on the shopping list:

Here you can create or restore a backup of the app settings, e.g. to share it with other family members (file contains credentials like API-Key).

After restoring, notifications might not work as desired and have to be restarted in the background in this app by turning the switches off and on again.

If there is incorrect data in the file being restored, the app might not work after that and the app data will have to be cleared.
Settings restored successfully, restarting app in 2 seconds
To use Grocy productively you need your own server or the Grocy add-on for Home Assistant.\nIf you just want to try out this app you can use the demo server from Bernd Bestel, the creator of grocy.
On another device, visit your Grocy website and go to \'API keys\' page. Click \'Add\', then click on the little QR code symbol and scan the QR code.

You\'re using the Grocy Home Assistant add-on. Create a long-lived access token in your Home Assistant profile settings (last section). Below the token field, click on \"Generate QR code\" and scan it here.
The app will connect to port %1$s.\nIf you want it to connect to a different port, you can add one to the URL.\nExample: http://domain.com:81/
The app will connect to port %1$s.
Clear the form first before scanning another known barcode.
This will be implemented soon. Please use your server interface for now.
Changes to the image are synchronised with the server immediately, not only when saving!
This is the default stock entry label type which will be prefilled on purchase.
The stock overview page lists all products which are currently in-stock or below their min. amount. Enable this to hide this product there always.
This product cannot have a parent product because it is already used as a parent product in another product.
Stock entries at the location below will be consumed first.
When enabled, on marking this product as opened, the corresponding amount will be moved to the default consume location.

When enabled, the corresponding product can\'t have own stock, means it will not be selectable on purchase (useful for parent products which are just used as a summary/total view of the sub products).
When enabled, on moving this product to a freezer location (so when freezing it), a warning will be shown.

Based on the selected due date type, the highlighting on the stock overview page will be different. \"Best before date\" means that the product is maybe still safe to be consumed after its due date is reached. \"Expiration date\" means that the product is not safe to be consumed after its due date is reached.
You can long press on an item below to enter a date instead of a number.
For purchases this amount of days will be added to today for the due date suggestion (-1 means that this product will be never overdue).
When this product was marked as opened, the due date will be replaced by today + this amount of days (a value of 0 disables this).
On moving this product to a freezer location (so when freezing it), the due date will be replaced by today + this amount of days (-1 means that this product will be never overdue).
On moving this product from a freezer location (so when thawing it), the due date will be replaced by today + this amount of days.
Quantity unit stock cannot be changed after first purchase.
Quantity unit stock can only be changed if unit conversions for the current quantity unit exist.
Quantity units can only be changed if unit conversions exist for them.
This is the default quantity unit used on purchase and when adding this product to the shopping list.
This is the default quantity unit used when consuming this product.
When displaying prices for this product, they will be related to this quantity unit.
If enabled, the min. stock amount of sub products will be accumulated into this product, means the sub product will never be \"missing\", only this product.
When enabled, opened items will be counted as missing for calculating if this product is below its minimum stock amount.
This amount is used for the \"quick consume/open buttons\" on the stock overview page (related to quantity unit stock).
This amount is used for the \"quick consume button\" on the stock overview page (related to quantity unit stock).
This amount is used for the \"quick open button\" on the stock overview page (related to quantity unit stock).

Tare weight handling is useful e.g. for flour in jars - on purchase/consume/inventory you always weigh the whole jar, the amount to be posted is then automatically calculated based on what is in stock and the tare weight defined below.
Tare weight handling enabled - please weigh the whole container, the amount to be posted will be automatically calculated.
This will be used as the default setting when adding this product as a recipe ingredient.
The following fields apply to newly added products.
You can choose a barcode scanner for camera barcode scanning.

ZXing ("zebra crossing") uses the contrast data from the camera stream to detect a barcode. It then calculates the relative width of all lines.

- Sometimes incorrect results
- Barcode has to be horizontally aligned
- Requires good contrast and sharpness
- Is performed completely offline on your device
- Framework is open source

ML Kit uses machine learning with the latest technologies for barcode scanning.

- Almost no incorrect results
- Orientation doesn't matter
- Even works for fuzzy or low contrast barcodes
- Is performed completely offline on your device
- Framework is not open source
You can use an external scanner for the field below while it\'s focused and empty.

This app supports external scanner devices which act as a keyboard and can be connected via USB or Bluetooth. The following options must be configured in your external scanner:

Prefix: None
Suffix: TAB or ENTER
The first item in this list would be picked by the default rule which is \"Opened first, then first due first, then first in first out\".
This is for statistical purposes only.

By default the amount to be added to the shopping list is \"needed amount - stock amount - shopping list amount\". When this is enabled, it is only checked against the stock amount, not against what is already on the shopping list.
The ingredients of this recipe result in this amount of servings.
When a product is selected, one unit (per serving in stock quantity unit) will be added to stock on consuming this recipe.
A different amount/unit can then be used below while for stock fulfillment checking it is sufficient when any amount of the product in stock.
When this is not empty, it will be shown instead of the amount entered above while the amount there will still be used for stock fulfillment checking.
This will be used as a headline to group ingredients together.
The resulting price of this ingredient will be multiplied by this factor.
With Grocy server version below 4.0.0 this list can contain wrong fulfillment information. Please update your server to version 4.0.0 or later to see correct values.
You can switch to keyboard input in settings, this could increase input speed for you.
You can activate reverse date format in settings if DDMMYY is preferred in your country.\nTo apply input and close this page you can use the Done key on your keyboard.
Tap here if you do not receive notifications or receive them unreliably.

If you do not receive notifications, tap here to open the Android app info page and check if notifications are allowed and if power saving measures can be disabled. Android sometimes delivers notifications later than the set time to reduce battery consumption, which is normal behavior.
Do not remove the app from the overview with currently running apps, otherwise some manufacturers will delete the notification process.

You can long tap on the title bar above to activate the quick mode. In this mode, a transaction will be executed immediately if a product has been entered or scanned and all fields could be automatically populated (by product and/or barcode defaults).

On each page where something has to be loaded from server, the app first checks with a tiny request whether the server database has changed since last time and only updates outdated data. Enable the option below to show a loading circle even for this tiny request.
Beginner mode is active: Help texts are displayed by default on all pages if available. Tap to change.
If the option below is enabled, a field for purchased date will be displayed on purchase and inventory page. Otherwise the purchased date defaults to today.
Tap on this card if you use Home Assistant with the Grocy add-on.
You\'re using the Grocy Home Assistant add-on. Therefore a few more details are required. Tap on this card to switch to normal login.
Tap here to show help texts.
Tap here to hide help texts.
In the field below you can also enter your Nabu Casa cloud URL if you\'re using that service. Tap this card to visit the Nabu Casa website.
You can create a long-lived access token in your Home Assistant profile settings (last section). Tap here to open the URL from above.
Navigate back or tap this card to scan a QR code which fills the fields below.

The action button on this overview page has two actions:

- Short tap: consume with barcode scanner
- Long tap: purchase with barcode scanner

With this button the quick mode on the respective pages is turned on by default. You can change this in behavior settings.
The action button on this page consumes the product with the given values. To mark the product as open instead, use the button at the bottom left of the menu bar.
Check out this Android client for the awesome Grocy project: \nhttps://github.com/patzly/grocy-android
Add a barcode with the button below
Create some with the button below
Go to master data and create some
Not a QR code with Grocy API credentials
Not a QR code with a long-lived access token from Home Assistant
Failed to load quantity units from product
Clipboard does not contain an image or it could not be read
The selected product has no children
Must be equal to or higher than %1$s
Must be lower than or equal to %1$s
This page only works with internet access. Check your connection.
There are no items marked as done
The required data could not be loaded completely
Not all required fields are filled

This server requires a certificate that is not known or trusted by Android.\nThe server certificate must either be signed by a trusted certificate authority (e.g. letsencrypt.org) or stored in the Android user certificate store of this device.
Install a web browser to display the help website
Barcode is not linked to a product
Stock entry from grocycode not found
For security reasons, uploading pictures is only allowed on self-hosted servers. You are currently using the demo instance.
Notification permission is required for reminders to work

There are embedded pictures in product or recipe descriptions on your server, which exceed the parsing limit of this app. Please remove high quality and large sized pictures from your descriptions, this will also speed up data loading.
Mark product as open is not supported for this product
Opened first, then first due first, then first in first out
This means %1$s is the same as %2$s.
There are stored barcodes, which are added to the product with the save operation.
Min. stock, Quick consume, Factor, Tare weight handling
Type, Default days (after opened, freezing, thawing)
State, Parent product, Description, Product group, Energy, Picture

Create new product and use input as barcode

We\'d like to thank the developer of Grocy, Bernd Bestel, without whose great work this app would never have been possible.
Self-hosted grocery management for your home
Open and consume with one swipe
Scan your whole purchase in seconds
Contrast for device theme has to be set in system settings
Dynamic contrast for device theme is only available on Android 14+
Many thanks to all the volunteer translators at Transifex!\nPlease visit us on GitHub to learn how you can help make Grocy Android available for your language.
English if translation is not available
Use Open Food Facts and Open Beauty Facts

To see more items at once

Checks stock daily and notifies you if there are products that are no longer fresh (expired, overdue or due soon)
Checks chores daily and notifies you when chores are due to be done
